content.rendered:
Directed by Ajay Devgn.

Written by Sandeep Shrivastava.

Cast Ajay Devgn(Shivaay). Abigail Eames(Gaura). Erika Kaar(Olga). Sayyeshaa Saigal(Anushka). Vir Das(Wahab). Girish Karnad(Anushka’s Father). Saurabh Shukla(Sharma). Sandeep Shrivastava(Indian Interpreter (as Sandeep Srivastava)). Amit Behl(Colonel). Vikas Shorey(Major). Pratik Khattar(Captain). Aakash Dabhade(Indian Trekker (as Aakash Dabade)). Bijou Thaangjam(Kancha (as Bijou T.)). Ambika Oli(Lhamu). Buddya Sunari Magar(Tresing (as Budda Suhar)). Naresh Thapa(Yungchan). Grace Girdhar(Kid Anushka). Raynu Verma(Lady Doctor). Aadil Sharma(Doctor). Gary(Bathrobe Man). Sharukh(Computer Room Man). Yuri(8 Year Old Boy).Nivaan Sen.Degvijay.Budhi Suhar.Alex. Vladimir Kolev(Colonel Borris). Markus Ertelt(Changez / Sgt. Nikolai). Miroslav Pashov(Ustinov). Swen Raschka(Ivanovich). Tsvetelin Pavlov(Mathew). Maciej Bielski(Andre (as Majik)). Ivailo Ivanov(Sergeant 1). Anton Poriazov(Sergeant 2 (as Anton Poriaoz)). Goran Mitrovski(Pimp 1). Robert Maaser(Pimp 2) . Yulian Caesar(Immigration Officier / Airport Passanger (uncredited)). Andreas Nguyen(Gangster (uncredited)). Viktoria Nikolova(Waitress (uncredited)). Georgi Stanislavov(Smuggler (uncredited))

Language Hindi.

Producers Rajeev Acharya. Parv Bali. Anjali Bhushan. Anil Davda. Ajay Devgn. Dhaval Gada. Alain Gagnon. Gaurav Gautam. Shreyans Hirawat. KS Jairam. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Natarajan Ramji. Vikrant Sharma. Iliya Sotirov. Anil Thakur.

Production NH Studioz.
